title: EVA Orchestrator Output Payload Schema V2
description: Strict specification for the final output payload from the Orchestrator module in EVA 8.2.0 Architecture.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the Orchestrator's final processing.

context_id.description: The unique ID for the entire interaction turn.

final_response.description: The final generated textual response from EVA to the user.

emotion_label.description: A human-readable label representing the primary emotion of EVA at the end of the turn.

resonance_hash.description: The StateHash_S1 representing the final system state after processing the user input and generating a response.
